metadata.title: CVE-2014-9587 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerabilities in RoundcubeWebmail before 1.0.4 allow remote attackers to hijack the authentication ofunspecified victims via unknown vectors, related to (1) address bookoperations or the (2) ACL or (3) Managesieve plugins.

criterions.comment: roundcube: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
